comments.creator: rcampbell@mozilla.com
comments.text:
It would be nice if we could display gridlines in selectable units and divisions to help designers align containers. We would need UI to select unit types (en, em, px, pt, ...) and a field to enter number of units between major / minor gridlines and ticks.

For bonus points, being able to draw guides on the background would be choice.
